coordinates.msg: There are various colors of Item Containers. You'll definitely find some great stuff in the Gold ones.
This area is a cornucopia of fruits and vegetables. It's a great spot for ingredient hunters.
You may be able to find abandoned Item Containers near the cliffs of Central Aelio.
The wide plains of Central Aelio are spotted with gently sloping hills. Many TAMES inhabit these lands.
ARKS can increae their Attack for a short time by chowing down on Quick Food made with TAMES meat.
Yellow, blinking Ryuker Devices have yet to be connected. Get them linked up to expand your range of operations.
ARKS can increase their Defense for a short time by chowing down on Quick Food made with vegetables.
